title: enrolled M.S., Data Analyst and Program Evaluation
Graduate Researcher
description_1: Conducted regional proxy and instrumental climate data clean and wrangling to get high-resolution temperature and poxy data sets
description_2: Applied PCA, clustering and multivariate regression analysis to divide China into 6 climatic regions and catch temperature signals from proxy data in each region.
description_3: Applied autoregressive integrated moving average, wavelet transform and hypothesis test to conduct trend and periodic analysis on the reconstructed temperature series and discuss its relationship with potential impact factors
description_4: Visualized temperature change in China over the past 1000 years

title: Research Assistant
description_1: Conducted data clean and wrangling to meteorological data daily collected from 2615 observatory sites in China since early 19th century, examined and adjusted data inhomogeneity to get homogeneous seasonal and yearly data sets
description_2: Applied hypothesis test and principal component analysis (PCA) to evaluate urbanization effects on climate trends in China
description_3: Converted geolocated data to grid data and visualized spatial and temporal distribution of temperature and precipitation in China over the past 100 years

title: Project Coordinator
description_1: Conducted climate data analysis to clarify the fact of climate change at high altitude wetland areas in China
description_2: Designed and implemented climate adaptive conservation activities at program demo sites
description_3: Cooperated with surrounding countries on high altitude wetland conservation

title: Project Manager
description_1: Sought wind power, biomass and other new energy projects with carbon emission reductions in China for equity investment
description_2: Implemented carbon emission reductions calculation and project profitability analysis on potential new energy projects
description_3: led a small team with 2 full-time employees

title: Engineer / Deputy director of a division since 2012
description_1: Managed 2 affiliated agencies and 14 branches on core meteorological service business in Beijing
description_2: Coordinated internal meteorological data environment updating
description_3: Provided weather supports to National Day mass parade, world championships, Beijing Marathon and the preparation of 2022 Winter Olympics
description_4: Led a small team with 5 full-time employees
